verbose_text: In this work, we report for the first time the formation of glycosylated vesosomes, which we call glucosomes, obtained in water at room temperature and near neutral pH (pH 6), by using a pH sensitive microbial glycolipid obtained from the yeast Pseudohyphozyma bogoriensis.
